articles.description: England's latest international camp has been riddled with confusion on the pitch and off it, Phil McNulty looks at what next for Lee Carsley and the Football Association.
articles.title: Finland 1-3 England: Clock ticking for Lee Carsley & FA after week of confusion

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Greece versus Republic of Ireland in the Uefa Nations League.
articles.title: Uefa Nations League: Greece vs Republic of Ireland - BBC Sport

articles.description: Follow live text and 5 Live commentary as England travel to face Finland in the Nations League.
articles.title: England vs Finland: Lee Carsley wants reaction from Three Lions after Nations League Greece defeat

articles.description: Mike de Decker causes a huge upset as he beats defending champion Luke Humphries 6-4 to win the World Grand Prix title.
articles.title: World Grand Prix darts: Mike de Decker stuns Luke Humphries to win title

articles.description: England interim boss Lee Carsley believes England deserve a world-class coach but said he is "definitely not" ruling himself out of the running.
articles.title: England manager search: Lee Carsley not ruling himself out of running for permanent role

articles.description: Australia secure their place in the Women's T20 World Cup semi-finals with a nine-run over India, who face a nervous wait to see if they will also qualify.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: Australia beat India to qualify for semi-finals

articles.description: Chicago’s rookie quarterback Caleb Williams puts on a show in London as he leads the Bears to a 35-16 win over the Jacksonville Jaguars on Sunday.
articles.title: NFL London: Caleb Williams stars as Chicago Bears beat Jacksonville Jaguars 35-16

articles.description: Maia Bouchier's classy unbeaten 62 helps England move a step closer to the semi-finals of the Women's T20 World Cup with a 10-wicket win over Scotland.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: England thrash Scotland by 10 wickets

articles.description: Arsenal expect William Saliba to stay despite Real Madrid's interest, Juventus could target Dominic Calvert-Lewin in the summer, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Saliba, Calvert-Lewin, Hoeness, Tuchel, Sane

articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold played at left-back and scored for England in the win against Finland. But did the experiment work?
articles.title: 'I joked I'd give him £500 if he scored' – did Trent Alexander-Arnold's left-back experiment work?
